overview:
Ron is a Digital Media Software Silicon and Systems Entrepreneur. He is the founder behind award winning Mingleverse Labs Inc, Mixpo Portfolio Broadcasting and Digital 5 Inc. Other previous Start-Up successes at iCompression, Arithmos, S3 Inc. and LSI Logic Canada.

Ron is an American/Canadian entrepreneur and angel investor from Silicon Valley and resides in Vancouver and San Francisco. Educated in commerce and electrical engineering technology, Ron specializes only in ICT early stage start ups and has been fortunate to be either an engineer, executive or founder of seven Multi-Media software, internet communications and semiconductor start up companies, many achieving great success such as iCompression, S3 Inc, LSI Logic, Arithmos, and digital 5 Inc. Ron has in depth industry knowledge with extensive global business development experience having worked and lived in USA, Canada, Europe and Asia. In Canada, Ron is the co-founder of and current CEO of multiple award winning Mingleverse Laboratories Inc. Previously, Ron was an EIR at BCâ€™s Yaletown Ventures and an LP in YVP II fund, along with 3 other angel investments in BC based companies including Mixpo where he served as its investor then President & CEO and board member until recently. Ron is an Active USA/Canada IT evangelist as well as past chairman of New Media BC Fusion Forum and former OACET member. In USA, Ron was the former winner of Tri-state CEO and company of the year for digital 5 inc and a member of the (NACD) National Association of Directors (http://www.nacdonline.org)
